title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 22 December 2008 - XWiki
content:
xwikibot - (22/12/2008 00:09): Design.How to create a new Asset Type was modified by xwiki:XWiki.LudovicDubost - http://curriki.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/How+to+create+a+new+Asset+Type  
fazzil - (22/12/2008 00:12): hello.  I am trying to deploy xwiki on a glassfish server using a JDBC datasource to PostgreSQL.  It's deployed fine but when I launch a browser to get to the main page so I can import the XAR file containing the pages, I get an exception.  
fazzil - (22/12/2008 00:13): It says "Errors in named queries: listGroupsForUser, getSpaceDocsName, getAllUsers, getAllDocuments, getSpaces  
fazzil - (22/12/2008 00:13): Can anyone suggest where I need to look, please?  
xwikibot - (22/12/2008 00:19): Design.Asset MP3 asset type was modified by xwiki:XWiki.LudovicDubost - http://curriki.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/Asset+MP3+asset+type
